sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Nav } from 'react-bootstrap';
import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap';

function CheckoutSteps({step1,step2,step3,step4}) {
    return (
        <Nav className='justify-content-center mb-4'>
            <Nav.Item>
                {step1?(
                    <LinkContainer to='/login'>
                    <Nav.Link>
                        Login
                    </Nav.Link>
                
                </LinkContainer>
                ):(
                    <Nav.Link disabled>
                        Login
                    </Nav.Link>
                )
                
                }
                
            </Nav.Item>

            <Nav.Item>
                {step2?(
                    <LinkContainer to='/shipping'>
                    <Nav.Link>
                        Shipping
                    </Nav.Link>
                
                </LinkContainer>
                ):(
                    <Nav.Link disabled>
                        Shipping
                    </Nav.Link>
                )
                
                }
                
            </Nav.Item>

            <Nav.Item>
                {step3?(
                    <LinkContainer to='/payment'>
                    <Nav.Link>
                        Payment
                    </Nav.Link>
                
                </LinkContainer>
                ):(
                    <Nav.Link disabled>
                        Payment
                    </Nav.Link>
                )
                
                }
                
            </Nav.Item>

            <Nav.Item>
                {step4?(
                    <LinkContainer to='/placeorder'>
                    <Nav.Link>
                        Place Order
                    </Nav.Link>
                
                </LinkContainer>
                ):(
                    <Nav.Link disabled>
                        Place Order
                    </Nav.Link>
                )
                
                }
                
            </Nav.Item>
            
        </Nav>
    )
}

export default CheckoutSteps
